markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Enhanced Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=4717) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Animist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=836" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
<trait label="Magus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=389" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
<trait label="Thaumaturge" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=432" />
<trait label="Witch" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=734" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=735" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 129 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 153 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Familiar Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=60) (Level 4), [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=98) (Level 6), [Shadowcaster](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=101) (Level 6), [Elementalist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=207) (Level 6), [Familiar Master](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=250) (Level 4), [Rivethun Emissary](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=308) (Level 6)

**Prerequisites**
a [familiar](Familiars.aspx)

</column>

---

You infuse your familiar with additional primal energy, increasing its abilities. You can select four familiar or master abilities each day, instead of two.

**Special** [Witch] Add the bonus familiar abilities you gain for being a witch to this amount. [Wizard] If your arcane thesis is improved familiar attunement, your familiar’s base number of familiar abilities, before adding any extra abilities from the arcane thesis, is four.

<title level="2">Enhanced Familiar leads to...</title>
[Incredible Familiar](/Feats.aspx?ID=5004)
name: Enhanced Familiar

</summary>
